title: Filter Non-Unique List Values
description: In this lab, you will learn how to use the `collections.Counter` method and list comprehension to filter out non-unique values from a list in Python.

meta.title: Python List Filtering | Unique Values Extraction | Lab
meta.description: This lab introduces the concept of filtering out non-unique values from a list in Python using the `collections.Counter` module and list comprehension.
meta.keywords: Python, list, filtering, unique values, collections.Counter, list comprehension

verify.name: Verify Filter Non Unique Python Script
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.
